Add PWA back gesture handler to prevent app exit

- Create usePWABackHandler hook to intercept back gestures in PWA mode
- Pushes history entries to prevent immediate exit on back gesture
- When at root, stays in app; otherwise navigates back within app
- Only activates when running as installed PWA \(standalone mode\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
